description:
kapp (pronounced: kap) CLI encourages Kubernetes users to manage resources
    in bulk by working with "Kubernetes applications" (sets of resources with the same label).
    It focuses on resource diffing, labeling, deployment and deletion. Unlike tools like Helm,
    kapp considers YAML templating and management of packages outside of its scope, though
    it works great with tools that generate Kubernetes configuration.
summary:
kapp is a simple deployment tool focused on the concept of
    "Kubernetes application" — a set of resources with the same label.
author: Carvel
